ai-vb10:1.2_0: mindfulness, investigation of principles, energy, rapture, tranquility, immersion, and equanimity.
ai-vb10:2.1_0: Herein, what is the mindfulness factor of complete awakening?
ai-vb10:2.2_0: It’s when a mendicant is mindful. They have utmost mindfulness and alertness, and can remember and recall what was said and done long ago.
ai-vb10:2.3_0: This is called the factor of complete awakening.
ai-vb10:3.1_0: As they live mindfully in this way they investigate, explore, and inquire into that teaching with wisdom.
ai-vb10:3.2_0: This is called the investigation of the (nature) of things factor of Complete Awakening.
ai-vb10:4.1_0: As they investigate principles with wisdom in this way their energy is roused up and unflagging.
ai-vb10:4.2_0: This is called the awakening factor of energy.
ai-vb10:5.1_0: For one who is energetic: spiritual joy arises,
ai-vb10:5.2_0: This is called the awakening factor of rapture.
ai-vb10:6.1_0: When the mind is full of rapture, the body and mind become tranquil.
ai-vb10:6.2_0: This is called the calmness factor of complete awakening.
ai-vb10:7.1_0: When the body is tranquil and they feel bliss, the mind becomes immersed in samādhi.
ai-vb10:7.2_0: This is called the factor of complete awakening.
ai-vb10:8.1_0: He’s well-concentrated mind in this way becomes completely equanimous,
ai-vb10:8.2_0: This is called the awakening factor of equanimity.
ai-vb10:9.2_0: mindfulness, investigation of principles, energy, rapture, tranquility, immersion, and equanimity.

ai-vb10:10.4_0: that is external things that are also the awakening factors of mindfulness, investigation of principles, energy, rapture, tranquility, immersion, and equanimity.

ai-vb10:11.2_0: there is a state that is investigating in (various) things in regard to himself,
ai-vb10:11.3_0: Investigation of principles, energy, rapture, tranquility, immersion, and equanimity.
ai-vb10:11.4_0: Investigation of principles is also the awakening factor of investigation of principles, energy, rapture, tranquility, immersion, and equanimity.

ai-vb10:12.3_0: that energy is the awakening factor of energy ...

ai-vb10:14.1_0: Herein, what is the calmness factor of complete awakening?
ai-vb10:14.2_0: there is tranquility of the body and the mind.
ai-vb10:14.3_0: Physical tranquility leads to the awakening factor of tranquility.
ai-vb10:14.4_0: When the mind is the awakening factor of tranquility for himself, it leads to extinguishment.
ai-vb10:15.1_0: Herein, what is the concentration factor of complete awakening?
ai-vb10:15.2_0: there is a state of immersion without placing the mind and keeping it connected; there is immersion without placing the mind and keeping it connected.
ai-vb10:15.3_0: Immersion while placing the mind and keeping it connected is the awakening factor of immersion.
ai-vb10:15.4_0: Immersion without placing the mind, but just keeping it connected is the awakening factor of immersion.
ai-vb10:16.1_0: Herein, what is the equanimity factor of complete awakening?
ai-vb10:16.2_0: there is equanimity based on the inside,
ai-vb10:16.3_0: Equanimity for internal things is the awakening factor of equanimity.
ai-vb10:16.4_0: Equanimity for external things is the awakening factor of equanimity.
